DogeBell.com

Javascript library for cryptocurrency payment.

DunkPay Token (ERC20)

DogeBell.com

DogeBell.com is the service for users who want to pay with cryptocurrency. Create a link, copy it and sell what you want. As soon as transaction is completed, confirmation process starts immediately Transactions are guaranteed by blockchain method.

‚ÄúPlay ball. Make your dream.‚Äù

INSTALLATION

Include script on your site.

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.dogebell.com/dogebell.js"></script>

USAGE

For sell ‚Äã‚Äãwith bitcoin (BTC)

var dogebell = new DogeBell()
dogebell.type = "BTC"
dogebell.address = "1Lc1jhXdsB7t1XpTdNbrchnxKQide9tMia"
dogebell.amount = 0.001 // 0.001 BTC

dogebell.shot()

ADVANCE USAGE

For sell ‚Äã‚Äãin dollars (BCH)

var dogebell = new DogeBell()
dogebell.type = "BCH"
dogebell.address = "19zgnCTYzq1eww1JpGCi5ZSvFPiCC7fVHa"
dogebell.itemName = "BascketballüèÄ"
dogebell.currency = "USD" 
dogebell.amount = 2 // 2dollars
dogebell.invoiceMail = "dogebell.com@gmail.com"

dogebell.shot(function(err,result){
 if(err)
 {
  alert("Something is wrong." + err)
 } 
 alert("Payment is success." + result)		
})

For sell with customize options (ETH)

var dogebell = new DogeBell()
dogebell.type = "ETH"
dogebell.address = "0xeB97444a0f0781890b8e7e317FCB0853a46880E6"
dogebell.itemName = "Í≤îÎü≠Ïãú9"
dogebell.amount = 0.1 // 0.1 ETH  
dogebell.customLogo = "https://www.google.com/images/branding/googlelogo/1x/googlelogo_color_272x92dp.png" 
dogebell.customColor="FF0000" // RED
dogebell.customUrl = "https://google.com"

dogebell.shot(function(err,result){
 if(err)
 {
  alert("Something is wrong." + err)
 } 
 alert("Payment is success." + result)			
})

For sell with destination Tag (XRP)

var dogebell = new DogeBell()
dogebell.type = "XRP"
dogebell.itemName = "R.I.P"
dogebell.address = "rp2diYfVtpbgEMyaoWnuaWgFCAkqCAEg28"
dogebell.amount = 0.01 // 0.01 XRP  
dogebell.destinationTag = "1017911454"
dogebell.selfClose = true

dogebell.shot(function(err,result){
 if(err)
 {
  alert("Something is wrong." + err)
 } 
 alert("Payment is success." + result)			
})

Get shortcut link for sell (DNK)

var dogebell = new DogeBell()
dogebell.type = "DNK"
dogebell.itemName = "üßöüßöüßöüßöüßö"
dogebell.address = "0xeB97444a0f0781890b8e7e317FCB0853a46880E6"
dogebell.amount = 0.01 // 0.01 XRP  

var link = dogebell.getLink()
alert(link)

OPTION

type (Required*)

  • type - The type of cryptocurrency. We support BTC/BCH/ETH/XRP/DNK.

address (Required*)

  • address - Owned by you. When the coin is deposited, it will be sent to this address.

amount (Required*)

  • amount - Price that you want to get. The default unit of amount is BTC/BCH/ETH/XRP/DNK.

currency

  • currency - The unit of currency that you want to sell price. For support currency see.

itemName

  • itemName - It will be described on your product. It supports UTF-8 encoded character.

invoiceMail

  • invoiceMail - InvoiceMail will send it to you when your transaction is completed. If you cannot receive any mail , please check you spam mailbox.

redirectUrl

  • redirectUrl - It is url destination to move page when your transaction is completed.

notificationUrl

  • notificationUrl - It is place where your server can receive request when your transaction is completed. Whole query string will be return.

customLogo

  • customLogo - It is a customized logo. Allow external image URL.

customColor

  • customColor - It is a customized color for invoice design. Allow Hex color code.

customUrl

  • customUrl - It is the URL that will be moved when the logo is clicked.

getLink()

  • getLink() - Create a shortcut link for selling.

destinationTag

  • destinationTag - It is the field for destination tag. (Ripple only)

selfClose

  • selfClose - After the transaction is completed, the pop-up closes itself.

TESTNET

Initialize new dogebell('testnet') for testing.

BTC TESTNET (https://test-insight.bitpay.com)
BCH TESTNET (https://test-bch-insight.bitpay.com)
